üç¶üç®Vegan Ice Cream made for Easter lunch last week üç®üç¶
3 1/3 cups nuts (cashews, macadamia, Brazil nuts) soaked in water for at least two hours 
2 cups coconut milk ou almond milk
1/4 cup coconut syrup
1/2 tbsp stevia extract 
1 tea spoon aga agar dissolved on 1/4 cup of water and bring to boil (optional) 
3/4 tablespoon vanilla extract
Pinch pink salt
1/2 tbsp cinnamon 
1/2 cup mixed frozen berries 
Instructions: Blend all ingredients except the berries together in a high speed blender or food processor until completely smooth. Add the berries into the mixture. Freeze in an ice cream maker OR pour into a shallow baking pan, place in freezer and freeze, stirring every 20 minutes until set. 
Served with fruit sauce and vegan caramel sauce.
